== Installation ==

=== Win32 ===

Extract archive to e.g. c:\vicpack and add c:\vicpack to your system PATH. (My computer -> Properties -> Advanced -> Environment variables)


=== OS X ===

In Terminal:

  # tar xvzf vicpack-v006-osx.tar.gz
  # cd vicpack-v006-osx
  # sudo cp vicpack /usr/local/bin/
  # sudo cp acme /usr/local/bin/ (optional)
